main_definition: Contractors are individuals or companies hired to perform specific tasks, services, or projects as per a contractual agreement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Businesses that provide specialized work and services in various industries
meanings_and_examples.example: After the construction of their new office building, ABC Corporation hired XYZ Contractors to handle all interior designing.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals who are engaged temporarily by a company or organization to perform work outside of their usual scope
meanings_and_examples.example: John Smith was contracted as an IT consultant for six months to help upgrade the company's computer systems.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Companies that bid and win projects from clients by offering competitive prices, quality workmanship, and timely completion
meanings_and_examples.example: XYZ Contractors won the contract for renovating John's kitchen after presenting a detailed plan and budget.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People who are self-employed or operate their own businesses on a freelance basis, often taking on various projects
meanings_and_examples.example: Sarah was a contractor working as a graphic designer for multiple clients throughout the year.
